messages.noVenues: No venues available at the moment.

blocked.title: Access temporarily restricted
blocked.description: Venue staff set a block on your account. You cannot view the guest feed or send vibes until it clears.
blocked.contactStaff: Contact the staff for more information.
blocked.blockShouldLift: Block should be lifted soon. Reload or contact staff if it persists.
blocked.help: Need help? Show this screen to the venue crew so they can review the block.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.signInAgain: You need to sign in again.
errors.inviteNotFound: Invite not found or already handled.
errors.activeSessionNotFound: Active session not found. Refresh and try again.
errors.couldNotSendInteraction: Could not send interaction. Try again in a moment.
errors.unableToUpdateInvite: Unable to update invite. Try again.
errors.couldNotBlock: Could not block user. Try again.
errors.onlyUnmatchOwn: You can only unmatch your own matches.
errors.unableToSaveOffer: Unable to save offer right now.
errors.offerNotActive: This offer is no longer active.
errors.addPhoneNumber: Add your phone number in Profile to send vibes and unlock matching.
errors.idPhotoRequired: Please upload a photo of your ID.
errors.idPhotoTooLarge: ID photo must be under 5 MB.
errors.profilePhotoTooLarge: Profile photo must be under 5 MB.
errors.galleryPhotoTooLarge: Gallery photos must be under 5 MB each.
errors.couldNotUploadId: Could not upload ID photo. Try again.
errors.couldNotUploadAvatar: Could not upload profile photo. Try again.
errors.couldNotUploadGallery: Could not upload gallery photo. Try again.
errors.couldNotLoadProfile: Could not load your current profile. Try again.
errors.storageBucketMissing: Storage bucket '{bucket}' is missing. Ask an admin to create it in Supabase Storage and retry.

pwa.title: Add Social to your home screen
pwa.description: Install the app for full-screen access and quicker re-entry into the venue.

headline.title: Welcome to Social
headline.subtitle: Connect with people at your venue tonight

venueSelector.title: Select Your Venue
venueSelector.subtitle: Choose the location where you're at tonight

qrSection.title: Have a QR Code?
qrSection.subtitle: Tap below to learn how to scan the QR code at your venue
qrSection.footer: Most phones open the correct page automatically when the QR is scanned.
qrSection.modalDescription: Use your phone's camera or any QR scanner app to scan the code displayed at the venue. The link will open Social and take you straight to the correct sign-in page.
qrSection.tipBrightness: Turn up screen brightness on shared displays for faster scans.
qrSection.tipBrowser: If the link opens in a browser, follow the prompts to sign in.
qrSection.tipHelp: Need help? Ask venue staff to guide you.

metadata.description: Social is the discreet nightlife companion for venues and their guests. Connect, match, and manage the crowd from a single progressive web experience.

header.swipeInstructions: Swipe or tap to send vibes. Match when both of you connect ‚Üí WhatsApp unlocked.
header.openingFloor: You're opening the floor‚Äîsend vibes to spark connections.

labels.theyLikedYou: They already sent you a vibe

toasts.offerSavedDescription: Show this code at the venue: {promoCode}

offers.saveCodes: Save codes and show staff when you redeem.
offers.saveToReveal: Save to reveal your promo code.

matchesPreview.matchedWith: Matched with {partnerName} at {time}. Tap to open your direct WhatsApp link.

emptyState.floorToYourself: You've got the floor to yourself
emptyState.privateDescription: Only you can see the crowd right now. Send a heart or invite to make yourself visible, or switch privacy off from your profile.
emptyState.floorDescription: Everyone else is still signing in. Drop a heart or invite to start the first vibe of the night.
emptyState.warmingUpDescription: Be the first to check in. As soon as guests arrive, their cards will queue up in your deck.
emptyState.privateTip1: Hearts surface you immediately for the person you choose.
emptyState.privateTip2: Toggle privacy off in your profile when you're ready to be seen by everyone.
emptyState.publicTip1: Invite someone IRL to join Social and they'll appear instantly.
emptyState.publicTip2: Keep the app open‚Äînew guests slide into the deck the moment they check in.

coachmark.sendVibeDescription: to connect with someone who catches your eye.
coachmark.theyGetNotifiedDescription: and can accept or pass in the Matches tab.
coachmark.matchUnlockedDescription: When both of you send vibes, you get WhatsApp chat access‚Äîno awkward number exchanges.

tooltip.heartsGetNoticed: Hearts get you noticed. Invites unlock WhatsApp once they accept. Mutual vibes light up the matches tab.

celebration.bothSaidYes: You both said yes at {time}. Keep the vibe going in WhatsApp.

tutorial.title: Welcome to Social!
tutorial.description: Here's how to connect with others at the venue

browseDeck.title: Browse the deck
browseDeck.description: Swipe through guests currently at the venue. Check out their photos, bio, and vibe.

sendVibes.title: Send vibes
sendVibes.description: Tap "Send vibe" on profiles that catch your eye. They'll get a notification in their Matches tab.

matchChat.title: Match & chat
matchChat.description: When you both send vibes and accept, you unlock WhatsApp chat‚Äîno awkward number exchanges on the floor.

onboardingRequired.title: We need a few details first
onboardingRequired.description: Complete your profile to start connecting with the venue.

header.subtitle: Vibes & Matches
header.title: Keep the energy flowing
header.description: Respond to vibes, check your matches, and jump straight into WhatsApp when it clicks.

incoming.empty: No incoming vibes yet. They'll show up here when someone sends you a vibe.

matches.empty: Once someone accepts your vibe, your match and a WhatsApp link will pop up here.

sent.empty: Vibes you send will show up here with their status.

confirmations.unmatchDescription: You can match again if you both send vibes in the future.
confirmations.blockDescription: They won't be able to see you or send you vibes anymore. This will also unmatch you.

whatsapp.messageTemplate: Hey! We matched on Social tonight. Let's keep the vibe going ‚ú®

onboardingRequired.title: You're almost there
onboardingRequired.description: Complete onboarding so the DJ knows who's buzzing them.

header.subtitle: Request a track for tonight's vibe.
header.description: Submit your song request to the DJ. They'll see it in their queue and work it into the night.

form.dedicationPlaceholder: Ring in the chorus at midnight!

success.title: Request submitted! üéµ
success.description: Your song is in the queue. The DJ will see it soon.

header.subtitle: Tonight's specials
header.description: From VIP tables to late-night bites, unlock the perks curated by the venue team.

onboardingRequired.title: We need a few details first
onboardingRequired.description: Complete onboarding to unlock your profile controls.

header.subtitle: Your account
header.title: Control how others see you.
header.description: Update your vibe, toggle privacy, or tweak your bio. Staff can still verify info when needed.

form.profilePhotoDescription: Guests see this at the top of your card. Choose a clear, welcoming shot.
form.phoneHelp: Required to send vibes and unlock WhatsApp chat with matches. Format: +1234567890
form.bioHelp: Shared when your profile is public.
form.galleryDescription: Keep up to four photos. Remove ones you no longer want and add new ones below.
form.noGalleryPhotos: No gallery photos yet. Add some below.
form.galleryHelp: JPEG or PNG ¬∑ Max 5 MB each ¬∑ Replaces nothing until you save
form.highlightsDescription: Tags appear on your connect card. Keep them short and punchy.
form.favoriteTrackHelp: Share a Spotify or Apple Music link to keep the conversation flowing.
form.privateDescription: When enabled, you won't appear in the connect deck. You can still browse others and send vibes. Venue staff always have access for safety.
form.magicLinkEmails: Magic link emails go to {email}. Ask the staff if you need to update it.
form.success: Profile updated. Your changes are live.

alerts.maxTags: You can add up to five highlight tags.
alerts.maxGallery: You can keep up to four gallery photos.
alerts.fileTooLarge: Please upload an image smaller than 5 MB.
alerts.filesTooLarge: Please upload images smaller than 5 MB. {count} file(s) are too large.

signOut.title: Sign Out
signOut.description: You can safely sign out from Social. You'll need a new magic link to return.
signOut.cancel: Never mind, return to the app

header.title: Sign in to {venue}
header.description: Enter your email to receive a magic link. No passwords, just vibes.

form.success: Magic link sent. Check your inbox to continue.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

errors.noActiveSession: No active session found. Please select a venue.

header.title: Venue Dashboard
header.description: Sign in with your admin credentials to manage your venue.

errors.sessionFailed: Failed to create session. Please try again.
errors.authFailed: Failed to authenticate. Please try again.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

errors.notAdmin: This account does not have admin access

header.subtitle: Step 1 · Profile setup
header.title: Almost there. Tell the venue who you are.
header.description: Your name and age stay private with the venue team. Guests only see what you make public.

form.phoneHelp: Required to send vibes and unlock WhatsApp chat with matches. Format: +1234567890
form.bioPlaceholder: Drop a line to break the ice.
form.profilePhotoDescription: Shows on your connect card. Choose a clear shot‚Äîno filters needed.
form.idPhotoDescription: Only venue staff can view this. Upload a government-issued ID or passport so we can verify you quickly if needed.
form.tapToUpload: Tap to upload your ID photo
form.idPhotoTips: Tips: face visible ¬∑ no glare ¬∑ no filters
form.galleryDescription: Add up to four vibe shots. They'll sit behind your card in the connect deck.
form.galleryHelp: JPEG or PNG ¬∑ Max 5 MB each
form.highlightsDescription: Tags appear on your connect card. Keep them short and punchy.
form.favoriteTrackHelp: Share a Spotify or Apple Music link to keep the conversation flowing.
form.privateDescription: When enabled, you won't appear in the connect deck. You can still browse others and send vibes. Venue staff always have access for safety.
form.success: Profile saved. You're ready to connect once the venue doors open.

alerts.fileTooLarge: Please upload an image smaller than 5 MB.
alerts.maxTags: You can add up to five highlight tags.
alerts.filesTooLarge: Please upload images smaller than 5 MB. {count} file(s) are too large.

chart.title: Attendance trend
chart.description: Track check-ins over selectable windows to understand your busiest times.
chart.emptyState: No attendance data for this range yet.

users.title: Guests
users.description: Manage who is currently in the venue and block disruptive guests.

requests.title: Song request queue
requests.description: Track WhatsApp requests and mark them as completed once played.

offers.title: Offers
offers.description: Toggle venue promotions on the fly. Use higher priority to surface key offers.

form.title: Title
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Share details about the offer and any fine print.
form.priorityDescription: Higher numbers surface first in the guest app.

details.noSaves: No guests have saved this offer yet.

venue.title: Venue customization
venue.description: Update guest-facing details, upload gallery shots, and manage your contact info.

fields.logoDescription: Upload a square logo for guest lists and QR pages.
fields.coverDescription: Panoramic photo used for onboarding and settings previews.
fields.galleryDescription: Share up to {max} highlights. Guests will see these on the landing page.
fields.noGalleryImages: No gallery images yet. Upload some to showcase your venue.
fields.replaceLogo: Upload a new file to replace it.

qr.title: Venue QR code
qr.description: Generate a QR code guests can scan to open your venue's sign-in page instantly.
qr.preview: Generate a QR code to preview it here.
qr.unavailable: Unavailable ‚Äî refresh after saving venue settings.
qr.scanDescription: Point your camera at the QR code below to open Social and jump straight into {venueName}.
qr.venueLinkUnavailable: Venue link is unavailable. Save venue details and refresh the page.
qr.qrError: Unable to generate the QR code. Please try again.

session.title: Session configuration
session.description: Session duration controls how long guests can stay connected. After the timer ends, all guests are returned to the landing page.

fields.sessionDescriptionPlaceholder: Highlight DJs, drink specials, or anything else guests should know.
fields.durationHelp: Minimum 1 hour, maximum 1 week. Guests will be signed out when this timer hits zero.
fields.entryFeeHelp: Leave blank if the session is free for guests.
fields.statusInactive: Inactive ‚Äî activate to let guests join.

points.1: Guests can only log in during an active session.
points.2: When the timer reaches zero, guests are redirected to the landing page.
points.3: QR codes and manual venue selection are blocked until a session is active again.

signOut.title: Sign Out
signOut.description: You can safely sign out from the admin dashboard. You'll need to sign in again to return.

venue.title: Welcome to Social! üéâ
venue.description: Let's set up your venue. This information will be visible to guests.

fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell guests about your venue's vibe...

session.title: Configure Your Session ‚è∞
session.description: Set up how long guests can connect at {venueName}
session.durationHelp: Minimum 1 hour, maximum 1 week. After the session ends, guest accounts will be deactivated.

points.1: Guests can only connect during active sessions
points.2: After a session ends, guest accounts are automatically deactivated
points.3: You can create a new session anytime from the admin dashboard
points.4: Each venue can have only one active session at a time

profile.title: Almost There! üë§
profile.description: Set up your admin profile. This is also your guest profile if you appear in the feed.

fields.bioPlaceholder: Tell guests a bit about yourself...
